net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao

Class EntityRetrieverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.EntityRetriever
      • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.EntityRetrieverImpl

  • @Component(value="hibernate-utils-entity-retreiver")
public class EntityRetrieverImpl
extends EntityRetriever
    An implementation of EntityRetriever that is intended to be configured through Spring. NOTE: This class should not be used directly. mapping EntityRetriever.class to a singleton instance of this class.
    Author:
    Kevin Beaty (kbeaty@i2rd.com)

        Description copied from class: EntityRetriever
        Load an entity by id.
        Specified by:
        loadEntity in class EntityRetriever
        Type Parameters:
        E - the entity type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the type of entity to load

      • narrowProxyIfPossible

        public <E> E narrowProxyIfPossible(@Nullable
                          Object entity)
        Description copied from class: EntityRetriever
        Narrows a possibly proxied entity to the most specific entity type possible. This will allow instanceof to work correctly for cases when an entity is proxied for a base class. Since the method may return a different instance, an identity check (==) may fail for the returned instance if compared against the specified entity.
        Specified by:
        narrowProxyIfPossible in class EntityRetriever
        Type Parameters:
        E - the expected entity return type.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to narrow if possible
        Returns:
        the possibly narrowed entity.

      • reattachIfNecessary

        @Contract(value="null->null;!null->!null")
@Nullable
public <E> E reattachIfNecessary(@Nullable
                                          E entity)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: EntityRetriever
        Reattaches the entity if it is in a detached state. If the entity is in a persistent or transient state, or if null, it is returned. If the parameter is not a hibernate entity, it will be returned.
        Specified by:
        reattachIfNecessary in class EntityRetriever
        Type Parameters:
        E - the entity type
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to reattach if necessary
        Returns:
        an entity, equal (possibly equivelent) to the parameter, reattached if possible.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • setSessionHelper

        public void setSessionHelper(HibernateSessionHelper sessionHelper)
        Sets the session helper. Must be set on spring initialization.
        Parameters:
        sessionHelper - the session helper to set
